definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
to release for medical treatment (of a prisoner)

sentences.english: Background Uninsured and underinsured Americans face barriers to access to medical care.

definition: to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
to transfer (a patient for treatment in a different hospital)
to receive hospital treatment/to be hospitalized
to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
to visit a doctor/to see a patient
to transfer (a patient) to a different hospital/to transfer to hospital (e.g. a prisoner)
to register (at a hospital etc)/to send by registered mail
